alert.note: Alert for Midland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Midland County through 730 PM EDT... At 645 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm near Sanford, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sanford around 700 PM EDT. Midland around 715 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Gordonville, Bombay and Averill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
